info.game_comments: (Alex: Your chance to become a millionaire with Jeopardy! and Sears, so get ready to Play & Win!)

(2, 1).clue: This former Dodger manager threw out the first pitch in the Dodgers' 1997 opening game

(2, 3).clue: Only Fran Tarkenton & this Miami Dolphins quarterback have thrown over 300 career touchdown passes

(4, 3).clue: Cartoonist who created the character Boob McNutt & a series of wildly complex machines
